Verses: 1 yaakkobu Than Kumaararai Azhaiththu: Neengal Koodivaarungal, Kadaisi Naatkalil Ungalukku Neridum Kaariyangalai Arivippen.
2 yaakkobin Kumaarare, Koodivandhu Kelungal; Ungal Thagappanaagiya Isravelukkuch Sevikodungal.
3 roobane, Nee En Seshtapuththiran; Nee En Saththuvamum, En Mudhalbelanumaanavan; Nee Menmaiyil Piradhaanamum Vallamaiyil Viseshamumaanavan.
4 thanneeraippola Thalambinavane, Nee Menmai Adaiyamaattaai; Un Thagappanudaiya Manjaththinmel Erinaai; Nee Adhaith Theettuppaduththinaai; En Padukkaiyinmel Erinaane.
5 simiyonum, Leviyum Egasagodharar; Avargaludaiya Pattayangal Kodumaiyin Karuvigal.

6 en Aaththumaave, Avargaludaiya Irakasiya Aalosanaikku Udanbadaadhe; En Menmaiye, Avargal Koottaththil Nee Seraadhe; Avargal Thangal Kobaththinaale Oru Purushanaik Kondru, Thangal Ahangaaraththinaale Arangalai Nirmoolamaakkinaargale.
7 ukkiramaana Avargal Kobamum Kodumaiyaana Avargal Moorkkamum Sabikkappadakkadavadhu; Yaakkobile Avargalaip Piriyavum, Isravelile Avargalaich Sidharavumpannuven.
8 yoodhaave, Sagodhararaal Pugazhappadubavan Neeye; Un Karam Un Saththurukkaludaiya Pidariyinmel Irukkum; Un Thagappanudaiya Puththirar Unmun Panivaargal.
9 yoodhaa Baalasingam, Nee Irai Kavarndhukondu Eripponaai; En Magane, Singampolum Kizhachsingampolum Madangip Patuthdhaan; Avanai Ezhuppugiravan Yaar?
10 samaadhaana Karththar Varumalavum Sengol Yoodhaavaivittu Neenguvadhum Illai, Niyaayappiramaanikkan Avan Paadhangalai Vittu Ozhivadhum Illai; Janangal Avaridaththil Seruvaargal.

11 avan Than Kazhudhaikkuttiyaith Thiraatsachchediyilum, Than Koligaikkazhudhaiyin Kuttiyai Narkula Thiraatsachchediyilum Kattuvaan; Thiraatcharasaththile Than Vasthiraththaiyum, Thiraatchappazhangalin Iraththaththile Than Angiyaiyum Thoippaan.
12 avan Kangal Thiraatcharasaththinaal Sivappaayum, Avan Parkal Paalinaal Venmaiyaayum Irukkum.
13 sepulon Katdalhurai Aruge Kudiyiruppaan; Avan Kappal Thuraimugamaai Iruppaan; Avan Ellai Seedhonvaraikkum Irukkum.
14 isakkaar Irandu Podhiyin Naduve Paduththukkondirukkira Balaththa Kazhudhai.
15 avan, Ilaippaarudhal Nalladhu Endrum, Naadu Vasadhiyaanadhu Endrum Kandu, Sumakkiradharkuth Than Tholaich Saaiththu, Pagudhikattugiravanaanaan.
16 thaan Isravel Koththirangalil Oru Koththiramaagi, Than Janaththai Niyaayam Visaarippaan.
17 thaan, Kudhiraiyinmel Eriyirukkiravan Mallaandhu Vizhumbadiyaai Adhin Kudhigaalaik Katikkiradharku Vazhiyil Kidakkira Sarppaththaippolavum, Paadhaiyil Irukkira Viriyanaippolavum Iruppaan.
18 karththaave, Ummudaiya Iratchippukkuk Kaaththirukkiren.
19 kaadh Enbavanmel Raanuvakkoottam Paaindhuvizhum; Avano Mudivile Adhinmel Baaindhuvizhuvaan.
20 aaserudaiya Aagaaram Kozhumaiyaayirukkum; Raajaakkalukku Vendiya Rusivarkkangalai Avan Tharuvaan.
21 napthali Vidudhalaipetra Penmaan; Inbamaana Vasanangalai Vasanippaan.
22 yoseppu Kanitharum Sedi; Avan Neer Ootrandaiyilulla Kanitharum Sedi; Adhin Kodigal Suvarinmel Padarum.
23 vilveerar Avanai Manamadivaakki, Avanmel Eydhu, Avanaip Pagaiththaargal.
24 aanaalum, Avanudaiya Vil Urudhiyaai Nindradhu; Avan Puyangal Yaakkobudaiya Vallavarin Karangalaal Balaththana; Idhinaal Avan Meyppanum Isravelin Kanmalaiyum Aanaan.

25 un Thagappanudaiya Dhevanaale Appadiyaayitru, Avar Unakkuth Thunaiyaayiruppaar; Sarvavallavaraale Appadiyaayitru, Avar Uyara Vaanaththilirundhu Undaakum Aaseervaadhangalinaalum, Keezhe Aazhaththil Undaakum Aaseervaadhangalinaalum, Sthanangalukkum Karppangalukkum Uriya Aaseervaadhangalinaalum Unnai Aaseervadhippaar.

26 un Thagappanudaiya Aaseervaadhangal En Pidhaakkaludaiya Aaseervaadhangalukku Merpattadhaayirundhu, Niththiya Parvadhangalin Mudivumattum Ettugindrana; Avaigal Yoseppudaiya Sirasin Melum, Than Sagodhararil Viseshiththavanudaiya Uchchanthalaiyinmelum Varuvadhaaga.
27 benyameen Peerukira Onaai; Kaalaiyil Than Iraiyaip Patchippaan, Maalaiyil Thaan Kollaiyittadhaip Pangiduvaan Endraan.

28 ivargal Ellaarum Isravelin Pannirendu Koththiraththaar; Avargaludaiya Thagappan Avargalai Aaseervadhikkaiyil, Avargalukkuch Sonnadhu Idhudhaan; Avanavanukkuriya Aaseervaadham Solli Avanavanai Aaseervadhiththaan.
29 pinnum Avan Avargalai Nokki: Naan En Janaththaarode Serkkappadappogiren; Eththiyanaana Epperonin Nilaththilulla Kugaiyile Ennai En Pidhaakkalandaiyile Adakkam Pannungal Endru Kattalaiyittu;

30 andhak Kugai Kaanaan Dhesaththile Mamrekku Edhiraaga Makpelaa Ennappatta Nilaththil Irukkiradhu; Adhai Namakkuch Sondhak Kallaraip Boomiyaayirukkumbadi, Aabiragaam Eththiyanaagiya Epperon Kaiyil Adharkuriya Nilaththudane Vaanginaar.
31 ange Aabiragaamaiyum Avar Manaiviyaagiya Saaraalaiyum Adakkampanninaargal; Ange Eesaakkaiyum Avar Manaiviyaagiya Rebekkaalaiyum Adakkampanninaargal; Ange Leyaalaiyum Adakkampanninen.
32 andha Nilamum Adhil Irukkira Kugaiyum Eththin Puththirar Kaiyil Kollappattadhu Endraan.
33 yaakkobu Than Kumaararukkuk Kattalaiyittu Mudindhapinbu, Avan Than Kaalgalaik Kattilinmel Madakkik Kondu Jeeviththuppoi, Than Janaththaarode Serkkappattaan.
